abstract: European finance ministers promise to support members of the euro zone that are deep in debt, reassuring investors.
snippet: European finance ministers promise to support members of the euro zone that are deep in debt, reassuring investors.
lead_paragraph: Stocks rose on Tuesday, extending a seven-week rally, as gains for commodity producers and a pledge of support by European finance chiefs for the region overshadowed lower-than-estimated profit at Citigroup and the leave of absence by Steven P. Jobs, the chief executive at Apple.

headline.main: Commodities and a Promise in Europe Lift Shares
headline.print_headline: Commodities and a Promise in Europe Lift Shares
